addr: Hammersmith Road. Kensington. LONDON W14 8UX GB
title: Weekday Tournaments
desc: Anyone rated under 2000 FIDE (or National Elo). Those without an Elo rating wishing to play in this section must have an ECF grade under 175. In the U2000 section English players must be Gold ECF members. Non English players must provide their FIDE Identification Number (FIN) at the time of entry. If you do not have a FIN, you must apply to your own federation for a FIN.  Anyone rated under 135 ECF, or 1730 Elo (FIDE/National). In the U135 (non-FIDE rated) section, all players regardless of nationality, must be Silver ECF members or pay an additional ?7 ECF Pay-to-Play fee.  90 minutes for 40 moves + 30 minutes for all remaining moves, with a 30 second increment starting at move 1. Default time: 1 hour after scheduled start time.  Players can take a half point bye between rounds 1-4 provided they are requested before the end of the previous round. Pairings will be according to FIDE swiss pairing rules.
